content.title: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.
content.author: Dhammapada, Verse 1 (trans. K.R. Norman, 1997)
content.quote_text: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.

generation.prompt: Mark Rothko style color field composition with large luminous areas of color that seem to breathe and glow from within, soft edges between color zones creating gentle transitions, colors chosen for emotional and spiritual resonance, minimal composition inviting contemplation and meditation. Capturing the vibe of mindfulness, attention, intention, awareness. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
generation.full_prompt: Create a 1024x1024 abstract artwork: Mark Rothko style color field composition with large luminous areas of color that seem to breathe and glow from within, soft edges between color zones creating gentle transitions, colors chosen for emotional and spiritual resonance, minimal composition inviting contemplation and meditation. Capturing the vibe of mindfulness, attention, intention, awareness. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
